resources.string: Password should be atleast 6 characters long

TAKE CARE was developed by (4) students of Bachelor of Science in Information Technology from Cavite State University, Don Severino Delas Alas Campus Indang, Cavite in partial fulfilment for their course. They were name READ. Stands for: Christine Marie S. (R)ivadeniera, Dencel (E)ncinas, Cristhea D. (A)placador, Johnica Claire R. (D)e Ocampo. The application was developed since 2018.
This Application provides different features that you may explore:

It is use to set a schedule for your medication intake and save it to your personal reminder history. MEDuler also notifies you if your medicine on hand will be soon out of stock. You can also send text messages to your added SubProfile the application will send text message according to the phone number you indicated during the addition of your Sub-profile or love ones.

TakeCare provides three different dictionaries namely: Medicine Dictionary, Medical Terminologies Dictionary as well as Common Disease Dictionary. The Medicine Dictionary is separated from three categories: Generic, Branded and Herbal Medicines while the Medical Terminologies and Common Disease Dictionary provides a list of common terminologies.

W.A.Y Doc means Where Are You Doctor? It provides a list of doctors from Cavite, it allows you to view their schedule and medication fee if available. The list of doctors listed came from Practo.com site.
Health and Nutrition tips to help you maintain and improve your health

TAKECARE is a mobile application that helps users regarding with their health care management. This application will consistenly remind you regarding with your medication intake according to what you scheduled.

Your use of any aspect of the application is a your own risk. You must consult wit health care providers and make your medical decision based on their advice.TakeCare is not providing any medical advice of any kind. Any actions you take base on the content, notifications provided by the application are taken at your sole risk. You should always check any information provided through the service to ensure its accuracy.

We do not warrant or guarantee that the Service will be compatible with your android phone. Information wil be transmited over a medium that will beyond our control and jurisdiction; multiple factors especially network availability may affect the operation of the Application.
